TestInformation.Title: Timed Firefox Compilation
TestInformation.Description: This test times how long it takes to build the Firefox Web Browser.
TestInformation.SubTitle: Time To Compile
TestInformation.PreInstallMessage: Some build dependencies might be needed that currently aren't handled by the Phoronix Test Suite including: mercurial, glib, dbus, libdbus-glib, libasound2, libcurl4-openssl, libiw, libxt, mesa-common, libgstreamer0.10, libgstreamer-plugins-base0.10, libpulse
